titles.title: I Lay My Sins on Jesus

comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I lay my sins on Jesus, the spotless Lamb of God; He bears them all, and frees us from the accursed load; I bring my guilt to Jesus, to wash my crimson stains white in His blood most precious, till not a spot remains.

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: I rest my soul on Jesus, this weary soul of mine; His right hand me embraces, I on his breast recline. I love the Name of Jesus, Immanuel, Christ, the Lord; like fragrance on the breezes His Name abroad is poured.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: I long to be like Jesus, meek, loving, lowly, mild; I long to be like Jesus, the Father's holy Child; I long to be with Jesus, amid the heav'nly throng, to sing with saints His praises, to learn the angels' song.
